Request for Proudly Serving feedback: Set guiding principles

August 10, 2022

A new Proudly Serving chapter titled Set guiding principles is ready for public review and feedback. This chapter was written by Laine Hendricks and Rebecca Woodbury .

We welcome your suggestions and ideas.
